original_title: Italy arrests Ukrainian over Nord Stream pipeline attacks, German prosecutors say | CNN
article_summary: Italian police have arrested a Ukrainian man, Serhii K, suspected of coordinating the attacks on the Nord Stream pipelines, according to German prosecutors. The explosions in 2022 left gas billowing from the pipelines, which transported Russian gas to Europe, and sparked an international investigation. The suspect will be brought before a German judge after being transferred.</s>
